channel.title: Junji Ito on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Junji Ito on Strat

item.title: No Longer Human
item.description: Junji Ito’s art combined with Osamu Dazai’s haunting story is a match made in hell. Absolutely brutal read.

item.title: Tomie: Complete Deluxe Edition
item.description: Juniji Ito’s drawing ability vastly surpasses his writing ability. Reading through Tomie has made that abundantly clear to me.

item.title: Remina
item.description: Junji Ito is cool. Uzumaki is great. A lot of his other work is just OK. I think Remina is also just OK.

item.title: Uzumaki
item.description: Junji Ito’s best work. Suffers a bit from the serialized format that most manga is created in (not all chapters are created equally). It’s great overall though.
